external_references.description: Cherepanov, Anton. (2019, November 10). ESETresearch discovered a trojanized IDA Pro installer. Retrieved March 2, 2022.
Pradhan, A. (2022, February 8). LolZarus: Lazarus Group Incorporating Lolbins into Campaigns. Retrieved March 22, 2022.

description: [Lazarus Group](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0032) has used schtasks for persistence including through the periodic execution of a remote XSL script or a dropped VBS payload.(Citation: Qualys LolZarus)(Citation: ESET Twitter Ida Pro Nov 2021)
